archdesc.runner: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle:
Office of the Dean of Students Office Administrative Files
1950-2000

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Access restrictions apply only to specific student records under the terms of the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (F.E.R.P.A.).

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Office of the Dean of Students Office Administrative Files, Accession #RG-18/2.1.971, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was transferred to the library in 1997 August.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Topical files from Dean Robert T. Canevari's office, including the files of the Associate Deans and Assistant Deans of Students.

arrangement.head: Organization
arrangement.p:
Series I: Dean of Students, Robert T. Canevari Boxes 1-11
Series II: Associate Dean of Students, Sybil R. Todd/V. Shamim Sisson Boxes 11-14
Series III: Assistant Dean of Students, Women's Leadership Development Boxes 15-17
Series IV: Assistant Dean of Students, General Information Boxes 17-22
Series V: Assistant Dean of Students, Greek Life Boxes 22-35
Series VI: Associate Dean of Students, Annette Gibbs/Ronald Stump Boxes 35-47
Series VII: Restricted Files Box 48
